org.openimaj.util.math

Interface ScalarArithmetic<OBJECT,SCALAR extends Number>

  • Type Parameters:
    OBJECT - The object type to be returned
    SCALAR - The scalar type to be added

    public interface ScalarArithmetic<OBJECT,SCALAR extends Number>
    Implementing classes provide a set of simple arithmetic operators which can be applied both in-place and on new object instances. These operators work on scalars.
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
